Title: Erratum to: Redefining ecosystem multifunctionality (Nature Ecology & Evolution, (2018), 2, 3, (427-436), 10.1038/s41559-017-0461-7)
Abstract: © 2018, The Author(s), under exclusive licence to Springer Nature Limited.In the version of this Perspective originally published, in the figure in Box 3 the middle panel of the top row was incorrectly labelled ‘50% threshold-plus’; it should have read ‘50% threshold’. This has now been corrected.
